Table 2. Comparisons to methods developed for recognizing 
long-range complex activities, Timeception [5] and PIC [6] on 
the Breakfast Actions dataset. Our method outperforms Time-
ception [5] by a significant margin showing the superiority of our 
method in modelling long-range activities.
